messages.message:
Hey, while making a ground truth set, how do I add/remove files? I can't seem to find an option to remove some of the config files or an option to add files that weren't in the original build project

cc @hannah
Unfortunately adding/removing files is not yet supported, but is on the roadmap! cc: @lydia @Serena
In the meantime, if you have a specific set of files, we'd recommend you collect them accordingly and then create a new ground truth set with those files
And to clarify @Hamish - adding/removing files is not above the line for the Q4 roadmap, but will be a future enhancement.
Cool, maybe just making this clearer in the UI would be fine for now!
On UI topics - tables or longer outputs don't look great in the UI here
:yupyupyup: tables / longer outputs donâ€™t look great in this UI or the results table UI in Build (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-2654)
@Hamish you can expand the table though if you click on it
You should see something like this
